overview: Hyeon-seok dreams of becoming a famous director. His wife leaves to Japan to get funds for her husband's movie and asks him to audition a new actress. On the day of the audition, Hyeok-seok asks Eun-bi about her values and passion in movies and when she says she'll do anything and even strip, Hyeon-seok tells her to pretend he's a friend. He tells her to seduce him. Eun-bi does everythng she can to do so...
title: Forbbiden Lust
